item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I want to tell you about three interrelated and indivisible aspects of my life. In myriads of ways, these components inform and enrich each others: Physics Family Faith Physics I first learned to appreciate science from my parents. My mother taught me to ask questions and to keep trying. My father showed me how to overcome challenges and gave me a sense of wonder for the universe; I have many fond memories of looking at the stars together.
